contents.text: Thank you for calling Qadium in San Francisco, your partner in defining and securing today’s network perimeter.
For sales and product information, press 1.
For a live product demonstration of Qadium’s network security platform, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a Qadium specialist for product demonstrations.

navigationGoals: Schedule a live demonstration of Qadium's network security solution.
Schedule a live demo of Qadium’s network security platform for my veteran nonprofit
Schedule a deep-dive demo of Qadium’s agentless network discovery and perimeter monitoring platform.
I’d like to see a live demonstration of your network security platform.
I’d like to schedule a live demonstration of Qadium’s network security platform for deeper evaluation.

contents.text: For enterprise pricing and licensing options, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our sales team for pricing details.

navigationGoals: Obtain enterprise pricing and licensing details for Qadium.
Get enterprise pricing and licensing details to plan platform adoption in my veterans support group
Obtain a detailed enterprise licensing quote and pricing breakdown for large-scale endpoint coverage.
I need information on enterprise license pricing.
I need details on enterprise pricing and licensing options for adopting Qadium at scale.

contents.text: For customer support and account services, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to a technical support engineer.

navigationGoals: Troubleshoot a technical problem with my Qadium setup.
Troubleshoot deployment and connectivity errors in my Qadium installation with technical support
Troubleshoot my Qadium sensor deployment – it’s failing to report new hosts in the network.
I’m having trouble accessing my network security dashboard and need technical help.
I’m experiencing a technical issue with my Qadium sensor deployment and need to speak with a support engineer.

contents.text: For account and billing inquiries, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our account services team.

navigationGoals: Clarify my latest billing charges for the Qadium service.
Review and correct billing charges on my account and update payment details
Update corporate billing details and request the latest invoice for our Qadium subscription.
I want help understanding my latest billing statement.
I have a question about a charge on my Qadium account invoice and need billing assistance.
